attr: Scaler value on top CLK_DIV to generate master SPI clock
Clock division value of the clock selected by CLKSEL. Division value is added by 1 to the programmed value
Selects the source for clk_spi 0: clk_ahb 1: clk_4mhz, 2: clk_lf

description: Matser mode
Number of bits on data frame
1: msb is transmitted first 0: lsb is transmitted first
Unused
0: Controller 1: peripheral
0: Motoroal format 1: TI format 2: DSPI 3: QSPI
Soft ware control for driving cs is enabled
Num of clk_spi cycle of CS setup time
Num of clk_spi cycle of CS hold time
Used in master mode: 0: SCLK stops after receive is done 1: SCLK stops after transmission is done
0: Frames in normal mode are sent/received first 1: Frames in QSPI mode are sent/received first
Number of SPI frames in normal mode
Number of SPI frames in QSPI mode
Applicable only for TX
0: Frames in normal mode are sent/received first 1: Frames in DSPI mode are sent/received first
Number of SPI frames in normal mode
Number of SPI frames in normal mode
Applicable only for TX
Number of SPI frames to be repeated after FIFO is empty
In slave mode, timeout for RX  not receing any data to generate interrupt. Timeout is specified in number of clk_spi cycles
number of SPI frames RX should ignore
